attributes.action: Remove 10days of staying in hotel quarantine as it’s expensive
attributes.additional_details: It’s expensive to pay for it and people cannot pay for it. Please get rid of this 10day quarantine
attributes.background: To remove 10days of staying in hotel quarantine and paying for it

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not enforce mandatory hotel quarantines for international arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571682

Review quarantine rules for international arrivals travelling for work: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/574771

Fund free hotel quarantine and testing for all UK arrivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575118
